mapper.select: select userId, lastSigDay, sigCount from signatureLog where userId=#{userId}

insert.selectKey: select count(*) from signatureLog where userId=#{userId}
insert.if: update signatureLog set lastSigDay=#{lastSigDay}, sigCount=#{sigCount} where userId=#{userId}
insert into signatureLog(userId, lastSigDay, sigCount) values(#{userId}, #{lastSigDay}, #{sigCount})
